~[if.~(f.table_info;table=pages;fn=count;dothisfor=all;*path=blurstudentinfo/home.html)=0]
~(f.table_sel;table=pages;fn=create_rec)
~(f.field_set;name=[pages]path;value=blurstudentinfo/home.html)
~(f.field_set;name=[pages]security;)
~(f.table_sel;table=pages;fn=save_rec)
~(f.table_sel;table=pages;fn=unload_rec)
[/if]

~[if.security.pagemod=/admin/blurstudentinfo/home.html]
	<table style="display:none;">
		<tr id="svusdBlurStuInfo">
			<td><a href="/admin/blurstudentinfo/home.html">Blur Student Info</a></td>
			<td>Configure additional jQuery to identify fields to blur</td>
		</tr>
	</table>

	<script>
		$j(document).ready(function() {
			var table = $j("a[href='/admin/tech/dde/']").closest("table");		
			table.append( $j("#svusdBlurStuInfo") );			
			table.find("tr").sort(function(a,b){ return $j(a).find("td:first").text().localeCompare( $j(b).find("td:first").text() ) }).appendTo(table);
		});
	</script>
[/if]
